summary: This bill mandates the Director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) to regularly report on arrest information. It requires ICE to report the total number of arrests, detainees in custody, and deportations. The report must include the percentage of individuals convicted of crimes and their ICE threat level designation (Level 1, 2, 3, or none). The reports will be published on the ICE website. Definitions for each ICE Threat Level are provided.
